'''Marihi''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A talented armored and weaponsmith, Marihi plies her trade in the Overlook, catering to the wealthy and the powerful, who care little for function and much more for form. While it doesn't utilize her talents as a blacksmith to the fullest, all that engraving and decorating pays the bills well and she gets to work with exotic materials.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons and armor. Unique items include the [Spearcaster](/spearcaster/), [Tuotilo's Palm](/tuotilosPalm/), [Queen's Rule](/queensRule/), [Lovers Embrace](/loversEmbrace/), and [Devil of Caroc Breastplate](/devilOfCarocBreastplate/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Marihi can repair the [Whispers of Yenwood](/whispersOfYenwoodDeadfire/) and the [Blade of the Endless Paths](/bladeOfTheEndlessPathsDeadfire/) for {{cp2|1500}} each, or combine them together into the [Whispers of the Endless Paths](/whispersOfTheEndlessPaths/) for {{cp2|3000}}.
}}
